meanings.definition: relating to or forming a circuit
meanings.sent1: The circuital connection between the battery and the light bulb ensured the electricity flowed smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The electrician fixed the circuital problem in the wiring to restore power to the house.
meanings.sent3: The circuital dance of electrons around the circuit was like a synchronized performance.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed a circuital path, looping back to the same ideas over and over.
meanings.sent5: The circuital nature of the maze made it challenging to find the way out.
